recipe.name: Cheese Luncheon Dish
recipe.preparation: In bottom of rectangular baking dish slices of buttered bread to cover bottom.  Add layer of grated cheese, a ground ham or tuna or crab meat layer (2 layers if more).  Rest 4 eggs and add 3 cups milk.  Add salt and 1 tsp dry mustard.  Pour over cheese and refrigerate over night.May substitute 1/2 cup sherry for milk.  Thinly sliced tomatoes and slice of fried bacon may be used on top.  Place under broiler 2 minutes.  Serve at once.
